summary.description: An ultrasensitive T-cell receptor detection method for TCR-Seq and RNA-Seq data | An ultra-sensitive and precise tool for characterizing T cell CDR3 sequences in TCR-seq and RNA-seq data | HomePage: http://bioinfo.life.hust.edu.cn/CATT | An ultra-sensitive and accurate tool for characterizing T cell receptor sequence in bulk and single cell TCR-Seq and RNA-Seq data. The tool can be found in: | CATT(CharActerzing TCR repertoires) is a tool for detecting CDR3 sequences from any TCR containing raw sequencing data (including TCR-seq, RNA-seq, scRNA-seq and any TCR contained sequencing data)
summary.name: CATT
